alert.note: Alert for Lake (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 01 at 7:37PM CST until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee...Missouri... Mississippi River Above Tiptonville For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River Above Tiptonville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 39.0 feet, In Tennessee, water begins to go over Tiptonville Ferry Road, Barr Road, and the farm land east of the Tiptonville Ferry Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 37.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CST Tuesday was 37.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 38.0 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
